Question
========
What is one reason to turn off Copilot indexing in RStudio?

Answerlist
----------
* It blocks access to all packages.
* It can expose project files to the AI service.
* It prevents code completion.
* It disables Quarto rendering.

Solution
========
Indexing can share project files with the AI service, which raises privacy concerns.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
